attributes.name: userName
attributes.description:
Unique identifier for the User, typically used by the user to directly
authenticate to the service provider.

attributes.name: name
attributes.description: The components of the user's real name.

subAttributes.name: formatted
subAttributes.description:
The full name, including all middle names, titles, and suffixes as
appropriate, formatted for display (e.g., 'Ms. Barbara J Jensen, III').

subAttributes.name: familyName
subAttributes.description:
The family name of the User, or last name in most Western languages
(e.g., 'Jensen' given the full name 'Ms. Barbara J Jensen, III').

subAttributes.name: givenName
subAttributes.description:
The given name of the User, or first name in most Western languages
(e.g., 'Barbara' given the full name 'Ms. Barbara J Jensen, III').

subAttributes.name: middleName
subAttributes.description:
The middle name(s) of the User (e.g., 'Jane' given the full name 'Ms.
Barbara J Jensen, III').

subAttributes.name: honorificPrefix
subAttributes.description:
The honorific prefix(es) of the User, or title in most Western languages
(e.g., 'Ms.' given the full name 'Ms. Barbara J Jensen, III').

subAttributes.name: honorificSuffix
subAttributes.description:
The honorific suffix(es) of the User, or suffix in most Western
languages (e.g., 'III' given the full name 'Ms. Barbara J Jensen, III').

attributes.name: displayName
attributes.description: The name of the User, suitable for display to end-users.

attributes.name: nickName
attributes.description:
The casual way to address the user in real life, e.g., 'Bob' or 'Bobby'
instead of 'Robert'.

attributes.name: profileUrl
attributes.description:
A fully qualified URL pointing to a page representing the User's online
profile.

attributes.name: title
attributes.description: The user's title, such as "Vice President".

attributes.name: userType
attributes.description:
Used to identify the relationship between the organization and the user.

Typical values used might be 'Contractor', 'Employee', 'Intern',
'Temp', 'External', and 'Unknown', but any value may be used.

attributes.name: preferredLanguage
attributes.description:
Indicates the User's preferred written or spoken language.

Generally used for selecting a localized user interface; e.g.,
'en_US' specifies the language English and country US.

attributes.name: locale
attributes.description:
Used to indicate the User's default location for purposes of localizing
items such as currency, date time format, or numerical representations.

attributes.name: timezone
attributes.description:
The User's time zone in the 'Olson' time zone database format, e.g.,
'America/Los_Angeles'.

attributes.name: active
attributes.description: A Boolean value indicating the User's administrative status.

attributes.name: password
attributes.description: The User's cleartext password.

attributes.name: emails
attributes.description: Email addresses for the user.

subAttributes.name: type
subAttributes.description: A label indicating the attribute's function, e.g., 'work' or 'home'.

subAttributes.name: primary
subAttributes.description:
A Boolean value indicating the 'primary' or preferred attribute value
for this attribute, e.g., the preferred mailing address or primary email
address.

subAttributes.name: display
subAttributes.description: A human-readable name, primarily used for display purposes.

subAttributes.name: value
subAttributes.description: Email addresses for the user.

attributes.name: phoneNumbers
attributes.description: Phone numbers for the User.

subAttributes.name: type
subAttributes.description:
A label indicating the attribute's function, e.g., 'work', 'home',
'mobile'.

subAttributes.name: primary
subAttributes.description:
A Boolean value indicating the 'primary' or preferred attribute value
for this attribute, e.g., the preferred phone number or primary phone
number.

subAttributes.name: display
subAttributes.description: A human-readable name, primarily used for display purposes.

subAttributes.name: value
subAttributes.description: Phone number of the User.

attributes.name: ims
attributes.description: Instant messaging addresses for the User.

subAttributes.name: type
subAttributes.description:
A label indicating the attribute's function, e.g., 'aim', 'gtalk',
'xmpp'.

subAttributes.name: primary
subAttributes.description:
A Boolean value indicating the 'primary' or preferred attribute value
for this attribute, e.g., the preferred messenger or primary messenger.

subAttributes.name: display
subAttributes.description: A human-readable name, primarily used for display purposes.

subAttributes.name: value
subAttributes.description: Instant messaging address for the User.

attributes.name: photos
attributes.description: URLs of photos of the User.

subAttributes.name: type
subAttributes.description:
A label indicating the attribute's function, i.e., 'photo' or
'thumbnail'.

subAttributes.name: primary
subAttributes.description:
A Boolean value indicating the 'primary' or preferred attribute value
for this attribute, e.g., the preferred photo or thumbnail.

subAttributes.name: display
subAttributes.description: A human-readable name, primarily used for display purposes.

subAttributes.name: value
subAttributes.description: URL of a photo of the User.

attributes.name: addresses
attributes.description: A physical mailing address for this User.

subAttributes.name: type
subAttributes.description: A label indicating the attribute's function, e.g., 'work' or 'home'.

subAttributes.name: primary
subAttributes.description:
A Boolean value indicating the 'primary' or preferred attribute value
for this attribute, e.g., the preferred photo or thumbnail.

subAttributes.name: formatted
subAttributes.description:
The full mailing address, formatted for display or use with a mailing
label.

subAttributes.name: streetAddress
subAttributes.description:
The full street address component, which may include house number,
street name, P.O.

box, and multi-line extended street address information.

subAttributes.name: locality
subAttributes.description: The city or locality component.

subAttributes.name: region
subAttributes.description: The state or region component.

subAttributes.name: postalCode
subAttributes.description: The zip code or postal code component.

subAttributes.name: country
subAttributes.description: The country name component.

attributes.name: groups
attributes.description:
A list of groups to which the user belongs, either through direct
membership, through nested groups, or dynamically calculated.

subAttributes.name: type
subAttributes.description:
A label indicating the attribute's function, e.g., 'direct' or
'indirect'.

subAttributes.name: display
subAttributes.description: A human-readable name, primarily used for display purposes.

subAttributes.name: value
subAttributes.description: The identifier of the User's group.

subAttributes.name: $ref
subAttributes.description:
The reference URI of a target resource, if the attribute is a
reference.

attributes.name: entitlements
attributes.description:
A list of entitlements for the User that represent a thing the User
has.

attributes.name: roles
attributes.description:
A list of roles for the User that collectively represent who the User
is, e.g., 'Student', 'Faculty'.

attributes.name: x509Certificates
attributes.description: A list of certificates issued to the User.

subAttributes.name: value
subAttributes.description: The value of an X.509 certificate.

attributes.name: employeeNumber
attributes.description:
Numeric or alphanumeric identifier assigned to a person, typically based
on order of hire or association with an organization.

attributes.name: costCenter
attributes.description: "Identifies the name of a cost center.

attributes.name: organization
attributes.description: Identifies the name of an organization.

attributes.name: division
attributes.description: Identifies the name of a division.

attributes.name: department
attributes.description:
Numeric or alphanumeric identifier assigned to a person, typically based
on order of hire or association with an organization.

attributes.name: manager
attributes.description:
The User's manager.

A complex type that optionally allows service providers to represent
organizational hierarchy by referencing the 'id' attribute of
another User.

subAttributes.name: value
subAttributes.description: The id of the SCIM resource representing the User's manager.

subAttributes.name: $ref
subAttributes.description: The URI of the SCIM resource representing the User's manager.

subAttributes.name: displayName
subAttributes.description: The displayName of the User's manager.

attributes.name: displayName
attributes.description: A human-readable name for the Group.

attributes.name: members
attributes.description: A list of members of the Group.

subAttributes.name: type
subAttributes.description: A label indicating the attribute's function, e.g., "work" or "home".

subAttributes.name: value
subAttributes.description: Identifier of the member of this Group.

subAttributes.name: $ref
subAttributes.description:
The reference URI of a target resource, if the attribute is a
reference.

attributes.name: id
attributes.description:
A unique identifier for a SCIM resource as defined by the service
provider.

attributes.name: documentationUri
attributes.description:
An HTTP-addressable URL pointing to the service provider's human-
consumable help documentation.

attributes.name: patch
attributes.description: A complex type that specifies PATCH configuration options.

subAttributes.name: supported
subAttributes.description: A Boolean value specifying whether or not the operation is supported.

attributes.name: bulk
attributes.description: A complex type that specifies bulk configuration options.

subAttributes.name: supported
subAttributes.description: A Boolean value specifying whether or not the operation is supported.

subAttributes.name: maxOperations
subAttributes.description: An integer value specifying the maximum number of operations.

subAttributes.name: maxPayloadSize
subAttributes.description: An integer value specifying the maximum payload size in bytes.

attributes.name: filter
attributes.description: A complex type that specifies FILTER options.

subAttributes.name: supported
subAttributes.description: A Boolean value specifying whether or not the operation is supported.

subAttributes.name: maxResults
subAttributes.description: A Boolean value specifying whether or not the operation is supported.

attributes.name: changePassword
attributes.description:
A complex type that specifies configuration options related to changing
a password.

subAttributes.name: supported
subAttributes.description: A Boolean value specifying whether or not the operation is supported.

attributes.name: sort
attributes.description: A complex type that specifies sort result options.

subAttributes.name: supported
subAttributes.description: A Boolean value specifying whether or not the operation is supported.

attributes.name: etag
attributes.description: A complex type that specifies ETag configuration options.

subAttributes.name: supported
subAttributes.description: A Boolean value specifying whether or not the operation is supported.

attributes.name: authenticationSchemes
attributes.description:
A complex type that specifies supported authentication scheme
properties.

subAttributes.name: type
subAttributes.description: The authentication scheme.

subAttributes.name: name
subAttributes.description: The common authentication scheme name, e.g., HTTP Basic.

subAttributes.name: description
subAttributes.description: A description of the authentication scheme.

subAttributes.name: specUri
subAttributes.description:
An HTTP-addressable URL pointing to the authentication scheme's
specification.

subAttributes.name: documentationUri
subAttributes.description:
An HTTP-addressable URL pointing to the authentication scheme's usage
documentation.

subAttributes.name: primary
subAttributes.description:
A Boolean value indicating the 'primary' or preferred attribute value
for this attribute, e.g., the preferred mailing address or primary email
address.
